quote_last: . He estimated that he still had at least another twenty minutes before the bridge party would begin to break up.
title: As the Crow Flies
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: One day, the 30th of September, at
quote_last: , a telegram, transmitted by cable from Valentia (Ireland) to Newfoundland and the American Mainland, arrived at the address of President Barbicane.
title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
author: Jules Verne
